column4: can someone help me find the file wkdev.sh? i am trying to set up lm sensors
what does "lsmod | grep emu10" print out?
on-board card, which you have nothing plugged into?
add snd_via82xx on it's own line to /etc/hotplug/blacklist, and reboot
i rebooted and it didnt fix it
show me the output of "lsmod | grep snd" again
you want me to redo it? this is what i got before: http://paste.ubuntulinux.nl/3904
before you had me do "lsmod | grep emu10", not "lsmod | grep snd"
add snd_cs46xx on a new line in /etc/hotplug/blacklist, too, and reboot
